Penmai Konda Mounam Song Lyrics Kadhal Geetham
#Ilaiyaraja

oadi vandhu maalai
poda thaeduthu maranam.
pesa vaendum orey tharam.

Manam konda kadhal
enn saabamo.
uyir konda kadhal
en paavamo.

ullam thaangavillai
azhudhen mella
kanneer thuligal
undhan peyar solla

yaarodum nee vazhalaam
unnodu naan vazhgiren
adi ennaalil
en jeevan pogum

maaradhu en vedhanai
vazhvodu yaen sodhanai
anbuthaan yaedum
en moga gaanam.

poda thaeduthu maranam.
